GTM.title: GTM Integration
GTM.description: Customer events on your website will received by Visilabs via Google Tag Manager integration.

Direct Integration.title: Direct Integration
Direct Integration.description: Provided event codes should be embedded to your website by your frontend developer.

Server Side.title: Server Side
Server Side.description: Send your customer events using backend code by backend developer.

product.title: Product Integration
product.description: Share your product catalog with Visilabs to create personalized recommendations.

offline.title: Offline Integration
offline.description: Connect your offline data with online customer profiles for omnichannel marketing.

webpush.title: Web Push Integration
webpush.description: Send web push notifications to your customers through Visilabs platform.
